title: Click chemistry modifications for the selective crosslinking of wood pulp fibers – effect on the physical and mechanical properties of paper
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9656-9667
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08590B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Abdelhadi Blal, François Brouillette, Éric Loranger, Gilbert Lebrun
The Cu(I)-catalyzed Huisgen cycloaddition click chemistry reaction is of particular interest in the production of paper sheets or natural fiber composites since it leads to the formation of chemically stable bonds between two fibers.
